function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"The division of participants into smart workers and non-smart workers based on their current working mode cwm","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Single-exposure regression analysis used to estimate associations between indoor-outdoor green features and psychological health outcomes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inclusion of covariates such as age, gender, education level, working mode, income decrease, presence of other people, and presence of pets in the regression models","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of beta coefficients as a quantitative measure of the associations between green-related variables and psychological outcomes","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of plant pots and green spaces may impact the transmission of contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Proximity to natural outdoor environments and road types may influence disease transmission","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Self-reported increase in levels of anxiety, anger, fear, and other negative emotions during quarantine","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of validated scales assessing perceived change in psychological indicators during quarantine","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential detrimental effect of quarantine on psychological health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to presence of other people living in the home","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to presence of pets in the home","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 in densely populated regions with significant social interactions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased activities in public and open spaces during the pandemic","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Depiction of climate change as a perpetual pandemic may trivialize the severity of actual pandemics and their impact on public health and safety","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to prioritize climate policy in the wake of the pandemic may result in missed opportunities to address long-term environmental and societal challenges","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The pandemic has showcased that academics and those in higher education can quickly and creatively change how they deliver lectures and are accessible to students","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The pandemic has revealed complex and shifting contours of how the disease is shaping global patterns of energy consumption, policymaking, and governance","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scholars designing energy programs may overlook the impact of electric vehicles on sustainability, leading to potential negative consequences","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The promotion of electric vehicles may lead to increased car-based mobility and a decrease in the use of active and public transportation modes","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"The use of electric vehicles may contribute to urban sprawl and increased competition with public transport and shared services","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemic complicating efforts to realize a ’just transition’","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerability of global society to disconnection bans and energy bill deferral","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for increased transmission of contagious diseases due to disrupted supply chains and altered social practices","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uncertainty regarding the lasting impact of the pandemic on social and political practices, including telework, travel, and mobility","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global reduction in oil and natural gas demand due to covid-19","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Feasibility of smart rotary car parking to save space in traditional oscp building","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High cost and technical complexity of transforming existing buildings for pandemic response can limit the feasibility of design interventions","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient space utilization in car parking configurations can impact the ability to repurpose parking spaces for public health needs during pandemics","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unused car parking spaces being repurposed for different activities could increase the risk of contagious disease transmission if proper precautions are not taken","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and temperature control in repurposed educational spaces could contribute to the spread of airborne pathogens and discomfort for occupants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hvac services leading to different comfort zones and potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of capacity regulations in educational buildings during covid-19 alert levels, potentially leading to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protection of interior surfaces from water, heat, moisture, and abrasion, potentially leading to mold growth and indoor air quality issues","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transformation of car parking building to educational spaces may require adaptation of the building envelope for heat exchange control, posing a potential risk of improper ventilation and air circulation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in illumination standards between car parking buildings and educational spaces poses a challenge in providing adequate lighting for the adapted spaces, increasing the risk of discomfort and potential safety hazards","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Adapting the building envelope for heat exchange control and ventilation in educational spaces may face challenges in maintaining a comfortable indoor environment, especially in extreme climate zones","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient heat exchange control in building envelope leading to climate-related health risks","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of partition walls between parking bays allows for easy adaptation of large car parking areas into smaller educational spaces, potentially leading to overcrowding and congestion","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Right-angle parking configuration may lead to inefficient circulation and traffic flow within the adapted spaces, increasing congestion and reducing air quality","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variation in building height standards between different countries and regions","category":"Political risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in floor area standards for parking bays","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagion due to close proximity in transformed spaces","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate natural ventilation in academic buildings a, b, c, and workshop building d increases the risk of airborne disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient natural light in most rooms on the campus can impact the well-being of occupants and potentially compromise their immune systems, making them more susceptible to contagious diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate interior finishing materials and lack of special installations in the car parking building may lead to poor hygiene conditions, increasing the risk of surface contamination and disease spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation and natural light due to building envelope design","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate spacing and allocation for car parking","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inefficient thermal performance of building envelope","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate space allocation for students and vehicles leading to overcrowding and congestion","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Congested academic and administrative buildings may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases due to close proximity and high occupancy","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
